"Xie (Easter)": "I love this hot, sunny weather! And when spring comes along, Easter always follows! I'll be sure to come up with a fun event this year, too!"
"That said... I'm in kind of a slump right now."
"I hate always having to ask you for ideas, but I hope I can count on your help again!"
"Woohoo! Are you making any progress? I'll wait as long as it takes!"
"Oh, but don't push yourself too hard! The spring weather is nice and refreshing, so make sure to leave yourself time to enjoy it!"
"We've prepared lots of eggs to decorate the venue this year! It's really fun thinking up different colors and patterns to paint them!"
"Hehehe, I just know the sight of a cutely-painted egg will bring a smile to anyone's face. That's what motivates me to do my best!"
"Yawn... Oh, sorry! I get lost in my projects and wind up working all night, so I'm kinda sleepy right now..."

"When all this is done with, I'm gonna hunker down and hibernate...
Hehehe... Seems like everyone's having fun..."
"Thanks for helping me so much this year! This is going to be the best festival ever!"
"Preparation hardly feels like work at all if you imagine everyone having fun with the results!"
"Leave the rest to me! I hope you'll enjoy the event too!"

"まだちょっと肌寒いけど
春風がさわやかで気持ちいいねー！"

"というわけで
イースターのイベント、準備中だよ！"

"いつも手伝ってくれて助かるよ！
今年も協力、お願いねっ！"

"今どんな感じなのかなっ？
いつまでも待つからねっ！"

"いろいろ動いてくれてるおかげで
大助かりだよっ！\u3000ただし
頑張りすぎないように、ね！"

"こないだ見た夢の話なんだけど
わたし、とっても大きな卵の中に隠れた
ふわふわラッピーに包まれて寝てたの。"

"そしたら、夢の中でさらに
会場を卵で飾る夢を見たよ！\u3000
……夢の中で夢を見るのって、変かな？"

"むむ、どうして楽しいイベントの前に
いつもお邪魔が入るのかな！"

"楽しそうにしてると
エネミーも寄って来ちゃったりする？"

"とにかく、たくさん協力してくれて
感謝感激、だよー！"

"おつかれさまー！
アイディア出しに会場の安全確保。
なにからなにまで本当にありがとう！"

"みんなを笑顔にするための
企画の準備もすこぶる順調。
貴方のおかげだよ！"

"あとはゆっくり休んでて！
最高に楽しいイベントは
わたしにまかせてねっ！"
